Linux process command lines that do not.Action: Collect Windows Event ID 4688 for process creation. Analyze command line arguments. Compare observed command lines against a baseline of expected commands using correlation analysis or frequency distribution to identify rare or potentially spoofed process arguments. Cross-reference initiating process with Zeek conn.log for suspicious network destinations.

Unusual process behavior or network acti.Action: Collect Windows Event ID 4688 for process creation. Monitor Zeek conn.log for connections from endpoints/servers where defense evasion might occur. Identify connections with anomalous entropy in destination patterns or unusual protocols. Use time series analysis on connection volume/patterns from specific hosts/processes to detect deviations that might signal successful evasion and subsequent malicious activity.
